## Before you start
| IMPORTANT! Use this editable spreadsheet to work on your questionnaire offline. |
| --- |
| - |
| Useful resources: |
| ðŸ‘‰ EcoVadis Ratings Methodology Overview and Principles |
| ðŸ‘‰ EcoVadis Document Guide |
| ðŸ‘‰ EcoVadis CSR Scoring Principles |
| ðŸ‘‰ How to calculate metrics? |

## Questionnaire
| Theme | Theme's impact on overall score | Management indicator | Indicator's impact on theme score | Question name | Question code | Impact on score | Can documents from your parent...

questions.question_text: Please provide information about your company's business activities and number of operational sites. Indicate if one or more sites has a significantly higher number of employees compared to other sites.

Does your company formally and publicly endorse any external sustainability initiatives or sets of principles? (United Nations Global Compact (UNGC)|Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi)|Other external sustainability initiative or set of principles|No endorsement/Do not know)

Which of the following applies to your company's reporting on sustainability metrics? (The sustainability reporting is externally assured or verified by an independent third party|The reporting is formally aligned with a sustainability reporting standard|A materiality analysis was conducted|None of the above/I don't know)
Does your company communicate progress towards the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)? (Yes, my company communicates progress towards the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)|Not yet/I don't know)

Does your company have any of the following certifications? (Environmental certifications, such as ISO 50001, ISO 14001, EMAS|Labor and human rights certifications, such as Fair Wage Network, B Corp, GEEIS, WBENC, SA8000|Business ethics certification(s), such as ISO 27001, ISO 37001|Sustainable procurement certifications, such as FSC, ISO 28000, SA8000|Other sustainability certifications|No certifications yet/I don't know)

Has your company been audited by an independent external auditor regarding sustainability issues at one or more of your company's locations? If yes, upload the audit report or Corrective Action Plan Report that shows the latest non-compliance results. Each report's publication date must be within two years of your questionnaire's submission date (Yes, virtual audit|Yes, on-site audit|No audit yet/I don't know)
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Employees health and safety (e.g. management of employees health and safety issues)
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Working conditions
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Social dialogue
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Career management and training
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Child labor, forced labor, and human trafficking
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Discrimination and Harassment
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: External stakeholder human rights
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: No policies

Does your company health  safety policy also cover activities carried out by your subcontractors? (e.g. at construction sites, on chartered vessels) (Yes, my company's health  safety policy also covers activities carried out by our subcontractors|No|No subcontractors working on the company premises or on construction sites|Do not know)

What actions are in place regarding employee health and safety? (Employee health and safety risk assessment|Health and safety emergency action plan|Training of all employees on health and safety risks and good working practices|Actions to improve workstation ergonomics|Actions to address stress and psychological wellbeing in the workplace|Other actions on employee health  safety not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/Do not know)

What actions are in place regarding working conditions? (Two-way communication system in place to facilitate employee voice regarding working conditions|Compensation for extra or atypical working hours|Family Friendly programs (FFPs) implemented (e.g. parental or care leaves, childcare services or allowances)|Flexible organization of work (eg. remote work, flexi-time)|Health care coverage of employees in place|Communication to all employees of remuneration process (e.g. salary grid, procedure for salary advancement)|Employee satisfaction survey|Employee stock ownership plan (not restricted to executive level)|Bonus scheme related to company performance|Other actions to ensure good working conditions not included elsewhere in this question|No actions / do not know)

What actions are in place regarding social dialogue? (Employee representatives or employee representative body (e.g. works council)|Collective bargaining agreement on employees' health  safety|Collective bargaining agreement on working conditions|Collective bargaining agreement on career management  training|Collective bargaining agreement on diversity, discrimination and/or harassment|Other actions to promote structured social dialogue not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/Do not know)

Are your company's main operations located in a region where the right to freedom of association is restricted by local law or regulation? (No: There is no legal/regulatory restriction on freedom of association in the region of my company's main operation(s)|Yes: My company's main operation(s) is located in a region where the right to freedom of association is restricted by local law/regulation)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of all operational sites for which an employee health  safety risk assessment has been conducted (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations represented in formal joint management-worker health  safety committees

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations who are covered by formal collective agreements concerning working conditions (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations who are covered by formally-elected employee representatives (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations who received regular performance and career development reviews (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations who received career- or skills-related training (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations who received training on diversity, discrimination and/or harassment

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: % of all operational sites that have been subject to human rights reviews or human rights impact assessments (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: Other indicator on the % of the deployment of labor or human rights actions throughout all company operations/workforce (please specify)
Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: No labor or human rights actions in place
Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations/workforce on one or more of the following items: Do not know

What actions has your company implemented to promote employee career management and training? (Skills development program tailored to employee needs|Regular assessment of individual performance|Individual development and career plan for all employees|Actions to promote internal mobility|Other actions to promote career management and training not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)

What is the percentage of operational facilities that are certified ISO 45001 or against other labor or human rights management standard? (0-20%|21-40%|41-60%|61-80%|81-100%|Not applicable (if only one operational site)|Not Monitored|Do not know)

What actions has your company implemented to promote diversity, equity, and inclusion? (Actions to prevent discrimination during recruitment phase|Actions to prevent discrimination in professional development and promotion processes|Training of employees on diversity, equity, and inclusion|Actions to prevent workplace harassment|Affinity or other support groups for minorities or vulnerable groups|Women's development, mentorship, or sponsorship programs|Actions to promote the inclusion of employees with disabilities|Grievance mechanism on discrimination and harassment|Remediation procedure for victims of discrimination and harassment|Actions to promote wage equality in the workplace|Other actions to promote inclusion of minority and vulnerable groups in the workplace not included elsewhere in this question|Other actions to promote gender inclusion in the workplace not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of women employed in the whole organization
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of women at top management level
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of women within the organization's board
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Average unadjusted gender pay gap
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of employees from a minority and/or vulnerable group in the whole organization
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of employees from a minority and/or vulnerable group at top management level
Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Not yet monitored/I don't know
Please report on the following metrics related to labor topics: Number of hours worked
Please report on the following metrics related to labor topics: Number of work-related ill health
Please report on the following metrics related to labor topics: Ratio of the annual total compensation for the highest paid individual, to the median annual total compensation for all employees
Please report on the following metrics related to labor topics: Average hours of training per employee
Please report on the following metrics related to labor topics: Not yet monitored/I don't know
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Employee health and safety
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Working conditions
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Social dialogue
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Career management and training
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Child labor, forced labor, and human trafficking
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Discrimination and Harassment
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: External stakeholder human rights
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: None of the above/Do not know
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Energy consumption and GHGs
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Waste
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Environmental services and advocacy
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: No Policies

What actions has your company implemented to reduce energy consumption and GHGs? (Training of employees on energy conservation and climate action|Purchase or generation of renewable energy|Purchase of verified carbon offset credits|Energy or carbon audit|Reduction of energy consumption of lighting systems|Reduction of energy consumption of HVAC (heating, ventilation, and air conditioning) systems|Reduction of energy consumption of IT infrastructure|Other actions to reduce energy consumption and GHGs not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)

What actions has your company implemented to manage waste? (Reduction of internal wastes through material reuse, recovery or repurpose|Training of employees on waste reduction and sorting|Internal sorting and disposal of waste according to waste streams|Reduction of material consumption through process optimization|Use of eco-friendly or bio-based input materials|Employee platform available to exchange office supplies between different departments or units|Refurbishing and internal reuse of IT hardware|Other actions to manage waste not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations on one or more of the following items: % of the total workforce across all locations who received training (internally or externally) on environmental issues (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations on one or more of the following items: % of all operational sites for which an environmental risk assessment has been conducted (please specify)

Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations on one or more of the following items: Other indicator on the % of the deployment of environmental actions throughout all company operations (please specify)
Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations on one or more of the following items: No environmental actions in place
Please identify the coverage (in %) of your company's actions throughout all company operations on one or more of the following items: Do not know
Please report on the following KPIs regarding GHGs emissions: Total gross Scope 1 GHG emissions
Please report on the following KPIs regarding GHGs emissions: Total gross Scope 2 GHG emissions (market or location based)
Please report on the following KPIs regarding GHGs emissions: Total gross Scope 3 GHG emissions
Please report on the following KPIs regarding GHGs emissions: Total gross Scope 3 Downstream GHG emissions
Please report on the following KPIs regarding GHGs emissions: Total gross Scope 3 Upstream GHG emissions
Please report on the following KPIs regarding GHGs emissions: Not yet monitored/I don't know
Is your company a respondent to CDP's Climate Change Questionnaire? If so, please upload the latest response you have provided to CDP. (Yes|No|Do not know)

Percentage of operational facilities certified ISO 14001, EMAS or against other environmental management standard? (0-20%|21-40%|41-60%|61-80%|81-100%|Not applicable (if only one operational site)|Not monitored|Do not know)

Describe your entity's GHG reduction targets (select all that apply) (We publicly announce our targets|We have an absolute scope 1 reduction target|We have an absolute scope 2 reduction target|We have an absolute scope 3 reduction target|We have an intensity reduction target|We have committed to or our targets approved by SBTi|No formal targets yet/Do not know)
Please report on the following environmental metrics: Total energy consumption
Please report on the following environmental metrics: Total renewable energy consumption
Please report on the following environmental metrics: Total weight of hazardous waste
Please report on the following environmental metrics: Total weight of non-hazardous waste
Please report on the following environmental metrics: Total weight of waste recovered
Please report on the following environmental metrics: Not yet monitored/I don't know
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Energy consumption and GHGs
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Materials, chemicals, and waste
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: Environmental services and advocacy
On which of the following topics does your company report metrics: None of the above/Do not know

Describe your entity's plan to achieve GHG reductions (select all that apply) (We have a time-bound action plan to reduce energy consumption or increase the use of renewable energy|We have a time-bound action plan to reduce scope 3 emissions|No action plan yet/I don't know)

How does your entity's management structure facilitate GHG emissions reduction? (select all that apply) (We have a dedicated budget for GHG management|We have a management team dedicated to GHG emissions reduction|Our management team's compensation is linked to progress towards GHG reduction targets|GHG emissions reduction is not embedded in the management structure yet/I don't know)

Describe your entity's GHG emissions inventory (select all that apply) (Our GHG inventory is designed in accordance with GHG protocol or other GHG accounting standards|We update our inventory at least once per year|No GHG inventory yet/I don't know)

What is the scope of the GHG emissions monitoring in your entity? (applicable to scope 1 and 2 emissions only. Select the best answer) (We monitor relevant GHG emissions for our entire scope|We monitor GHG emissions with significant exclusions|No GHG inventory yet/I don't know)

Describe your entity's progress towards GHG reduction targets (Select the best answer) (Our latest review showed that we are falling behind|Our latest review showed that we are on track to meet our targets|Our latest review showed that we are ahead|No review yet/I don't know)

Describe your entity's GHG reporting practices (Select all that apply) (We share GHG emissions with internal stakeholders|Our GHG emissions report is publicly available|We respond to CDP|We verify our GHG emissions through a third party|We do not disclose our emissions yet/I don't know)
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Sustainable procurement policy on environmental issues
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Supplier social practices
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: No policies yet/I don't know

What actions has your company implemented to integrate social and environmental factors within procurement? (Supplier sustainability code of conduct|Integration of social and environmental clauses into supplier contracts|Risk assessment of adverse sustainability impacts in the supply chain|Supplier assessment on environmental and social practices|Training of buyers on social and environmental issues within the supply chain|On-site audits of suppliers on environmental and social issues|Capacity building of suppliers on the risks of adverse sustainability impacts|Incentive programs for suppliers based on their environmental and social performances|Sustainable procurement objectives integrated into buyer performance reviews|Worker voice surveys or grievance mechanisms for suppliers|Other actions to promote sustainable procurement not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)

Do you have a supplier diversity program in place or other actions designed to advance diversity in the supply chain? (Actions to work with women-owned businesses in the supply chain|Actions to work with businesses owned by minorities/vulnerable groups in the supply chain|Actions to advance diversity, equity and inclusion in the workforce of suppliers|Other actions designed to advance diversity in the supply chain not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)

Does your supplier diversity program apply to all your suppliers globally? (Yes, my company has a supplier diversity program in place that applies to all suppliers globally|No actions yet/I don't know)
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Reporting year
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Percentage of targeted suppliers that have signed the sustainable procurement charter or supplier code of conduct
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Percentage of targeted suppliers with contracts that include clauses on environmental, labor, and human rights requirements
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Percentage of targeted suppliers that have gone through a sustainability assessment
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Percentage of targeted suppliers that have gone through a sustainability on-site audit
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Percentage of buyers across all locations who have received training on sustainable procurement
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Percentage or number of audited or assessed suppliers engaged in corrective actions or capacity building
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Other metrics on sustainable procurement
Please report on the following sustainable procurement metrics: Not monitored/Do not know

How does your entity reduce scope 3 emissions? (select all that apply) (We engage suppliers in climate action|We purchase products/services based on GHG emissions intensity or GHG reduction efforts|We take actions to reduce emissions from business travel, employee commuting, or downstream transportation|We took other actions to reduce GHG emissions in the value chain|No actions yet/I don't know)

How does your entity monitor scope 3 emissions? (select all that apply) (We screen scope 3 categories to identify the most relevant for our activity|We track upstream scope 3 emissions|We track downstream scope 3 emissions|We do not monitor scope 3 emissions yet/I don't know)
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Corruption
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Conflict of interest
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Fraud
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Money laundering
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Anti-competitive practices
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: Responsible information management
Does your company have a policy with qualitative objectives and quantitative targets for: No policy

What actions are in place to prevent corruption and bribery? (Awareness training performed to prevent corruption and bribery|Anti-corruption due diligence program on third parties in place|Whistleblower procedure for stakeholders to report corruption and bribery|Corruption risk assessments performed|Audits of control procedures (e.g. accounting, purchasing etc.) to prevent corruption and bribery|Specific approval procedure for sensitive transactions (e.g. gifts, travel)|Other actions to prevent any form of corruption not included elsewhere in this question|No actions in place/Do not know)

What actions are in place regarding information security? (Awareness training to prevent information security breaches|Information security due diligence program on third parties in place|Whistleblower procedure for stakeholders to report information security concerns|Information security risk assessments performed|Audits of control procedures to prevent information security breaches|Incident response procedure (IRP) to manage breaches of confidential information|Implementation of a records retention schedule|Measures to protect third party data from unauthorized access or disclosure|Measures for gaining stakeholder consent regarding the processing, sharing and retention of confidential information|Other actions to ensure information security not included elsewhere in this question|No actions in place/Do not know)

What actions are in place to prevent anticompetitive practices? (Awareness training performed to prevent anti-competitive practices|Whistleblower procedure for stakeholders to report anti-competitive practices|Anti-competitive practices risk assessments performed|Audits of control procedures to prevent anti-competitive practices|Provision of competitor interaction guidelines to key employees|Other actions to prevent anticompetitive practices not included elsewhere in this question|No actions in place/Do not know)
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Reporting year
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Percentage of total workforce trained (e.g. through e-learning) on business ethics issues
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Number of reports related to whistleblower procedure
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Number of confirmed corruption incidents
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Number of confirmed information security incidents

Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Percentage of all operational sites for which an internal audit/risk assessment concerning business ethics issues has been conducted
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Percentage of all operational sites with certified anti-corruption management system

Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Percentage of all operational sites with an information security management system (ISMS) certified to ISO 27000 (or other equivalent/similar standard)
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Other KPIs on ethics
Please report on the following Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to ethics (please specify the year): Not monitored/Do not know

  <q type="multiple_choice">What actions are in place regarding social dialogue? (Employee representatives or employee representative body (e.g. works council)|Collective bargaining agreement on employees' health & safety|Collective bargaining agreement on working conditions|Collective bargaining agreement on career management & training|Collective bargaining agreement on diversity, discrimination and/or harassment|Other actions to promote structured social dialogue not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/Do not know)</q>
  <q type="single_choice">Are your company's main operations located in a region where the right to freedom of association is restricted by local law or regulation? (No: There is no legal/regulatory restriction on freedom of association in the region of my company's main operation(s)|Yes: My company's main operation(s) is located in a region where the right to freedom of association is restricted by local law/regulation)</q>

(Actions to prevent discrimination during recruitment phase|Actions to prevent discrimination in professional development and promotion processes|Training of employees on diversity, equity, and inclusion|Actions to prevent workplace harassment|Affinity or other support groups for minorities or vulnerable groups|Women's development, mentorship, or sponsorship programs|Actions to promote the inclusion of employees with disabilities|Grievance mechanism on discrimination and harassment|Remediation procedure for victims of discrimination and harassment|Actions to promote wage equality in the workplace|Other actions to promote inclusion of minority and vulnerable groups in the workplace not included elsewhere in this question|Other actions to promote gender inclusion in the workplace not included elsewhere in this question|No actions yet/I don't know)</q>

  <q type="grouped_question">Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of women at top management level</q>

  <q type="grouped_question">Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of employees from a minority and/or vulnerable group in the whole organization</q>
  <q type="grouped_question">Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Percentage of employees from a minority and/or vulnerable group at top management level</q>
  <q type="grouped_question">Please report on the following KPIs related to workplace diversity: Not yet monitored/I don't know</q>
